name: Citadale Resurrection
description:
Infamy returns - and this time it is free!

The dark lord has been slain. But evil forces throughout the centuries have always tried to bring him back to un-life. And every time, heroes stood against them, preventing the worst from happening. And these are their adventures. Set throughout history, their strength, wisdom and courage lead them down into darkness. Can they bring back the light, or die trying?

Citadale Resurrection is a collection of old-school retro Citadale games in the style of various systems released in the early 1990s. Each game has its own unique look, sound, gameplay style and feel. And yet, they are all distinctly Citadale. And, to lure you in, the first game in this collection is free. Start up and play, no hidden fees, no secret costs, 100% free. Should you like what you get, you can buy the other games as DLC. Three games are available, two on launch day and the third one shortly after that. More games may be released if people want them.

Bringing back the past to forge a future.

  • Strength in Agony
    This is the tale of a young girl’s struggle to escape the dark halls of the castle after her abduction. This Content Pack is automatically installed when you download this game. It also unlocks the soundtrack in the in-game jukebox.

  • Book of Shadows
    A journey into darkness begins when the missing pages of an infamous tome threaten to fall into the wrong hands. This DLC Pack unlocks the whole Book of Shadows game as well as its soundtrack in the in-game jukebox.

  • Prelude to War
    The son of the Dark Lord of the old lands searches for a fitting resting place for his father’s cursed remains. This DLC Pack unlocks the whole Prelude to War game as well as its soundtrack in the in-game jukebox.

-------------------------------
Controller Information:
Due to limitations with the engine, some controllers may not work properly. There is, unfortunately, nothing I can do about that. Should you have any trouble with your gamepad, maybe try another gamepad or use the keyboard. I apologize for the inconvenience.
